name: Verify Neuros Terminal Visuals and Activation
description: Validates the visual appearance and activation mechanism of the Neuros terminal in Region 0b.
testObjective: Ensure the Neuros terminal displays correct visual elements and activates via standard interaction keys.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Locate the Neuros terminal on the left side of the cabin.

steps.expected: Displays 'Neuros' in red text, '301E' in white subtext, and a crudely drawn star spinning above it.

steps.action: Interact with the screen using [LMB] or [E].
